summary: Sauron is the main villain in J.R.R. Tolkien's *The Lord of the Rings*. He wants to rule all of Middle-earth and does so from his land, Mordor. He is known for creating the One Ring to control others. Sauron is often shown as just an eye, but in the movies, he is sometimes seen as a human-like figure. He is considered very evil, similar to the character Dracula. In Tolkien's earlier book, *The Hobbit*, he is called the "Necromancer."
title: Sauron
